title: Enterprise Veeam Backup & Disaster Recovery
shortDescription: Implemented comprehensive enterprise backup solution using Veeam Backup & Replication for Microsoft 365 and on-premises infrastructure. Deployed automated backup workflows protecting 800+ mailboxes, OneDrive data, SharePoint sites, and critical business applications running on Nutanix hypervisor. Configured backup policies with 3-2-1 strategy, immutable backups for ransomware protection, and disaster recovery testing procedures ensuring 99.9% data recoverability and RPO of 4 hours. Established monitoring dashboards for backup job tracking, storage optimization, and automated alerting for failed jobs via n8n workflows.
